plot: Casper is kicked out of the Society of Ghosts when he admits he does not like scaring people. Dejected, desperate and friendless, he decides to drown himself. And, evidently, confused, also...
title: Casper's Spree Under the Sea
plot_es: Casper is kicked out of the Society of Ghosts when he admits he does not like scaring people. Dejected, desperate and friendless, he decides to drown himself. And, evidently, confused, also...

cast.role: Ghost Leader /              Fish Fair Barker /              Fisherman
